backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining all core types for sessions, channels, messages, documents, images, files, and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module containing old type definitions and data structures used for upgrading persisted canister state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries for major frontend source files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/docs/regression-test-plan-playe: Regression test plan detailing player document upload scenarios, expected results, and error handling checks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including light/dark theme variables and shared utility layers.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point initializing theme mode early and loading the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling identity login, profile setup, session restoration and routing between lobby and session pages.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: Error boundary that displays a recovery UI and allows reloading or clearing local data when an error occurs.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChannelChat: Chat interface for a session channel supporting text, dice roll commands, file uploads, and reply targeting.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders a chat message with avatar, reply preview, long-press handling, and optional image display.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCom: Loads, displays, adds, and deletes comments on a document, with host permissions and error handling.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCon: Parses embedded file markers and renders document text with inline image previews and file attachments.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentEdi: Editor for host documents with saving, file uploads, image insertion, preview mode, and comment integration.
frontend/src/components/docs/ImageUpload: Dialog for selecting, validating, titling, and uploading an image file.
frontend/src/components/docs/PlayerDocum: Editor for player-owned documents with saving, visibility controls, file uploads, and preview features.
frontend/src/components/profile/Avatar.t: Avatar component that displays a user's profile image or initials with size variants.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: UI section for uploading, previewing, and removing a user's profile picture with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/session/ChannelM: Dialogs to create, rename, and delete session channels using actor API calls.
frontend/src/components/session/Document: Provides dialogs for creating, renaming, deleting, and locking documents using actor API calls with state management and UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/session/HostSess: Implements session export and import controls with file parsing, confirmation dialog, and error handling for host users.
frontend/src/components/session/MembersC: Contains dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting member channels using session data mutations and simple validation.
frontend/src/components/session/PlayerDo: Defines dialogs and menus for creating, renaming, deleting, and managing privacy of player-owned documents through related mutations.
Displays a dialog listing player documents with create option, ownership indicators, and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionD: Dialog component for listing, creating, renaming, deleting, and selecting session documents.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionS: Sidebar showing channels and members’ channels with controls for creation and selection.
frontend/src/components/settings/PreLobb: Settings page for theme, background, nickname, and template management before entering a lobby.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling intervals for messages, lists, session info, and document content.
Context provider managing user preferences with update and reset utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor, updating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentComments.t: Hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting comments on documents.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentFiles.ts: Hooks for listing, retrieving, and uploading document file references.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentImages.ts: Hooks for listing and adding images to documents or player documents.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerDocuments.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, editing, renaming, deleting, and changing visibility of player documents through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: Implements a simple polling hook that repeatedly invokes a callback at a specified interval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Re-exports the usePreferences hook from the PreferencesContext for compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionData.ts: Provides session-related data via React Query, including sessions, channels, members' channels, and messages, plus mutations for managing channels.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionDocuments.t: Defines React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, editing, renaming, and deleting session-level documents.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Fetches a user's display name, falling back to a shortened principal if no profile name exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to get and update user profiles, including the caller’s profile and profile picture management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and UI utility classes for layout and styling.
frontend/src/lib/clearLocalAppData.ts: Clears specific localStorage keys and all sessionStorage, with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/documentFileMarkers.ts: Provides utilities for creating, parsing, inserting, and removing custom file marker tags within document content.
frontend/src/lib/documentImageMarkers.ts: Parses, creates, inserts, and removes custom [IMAGE:id:caption] markers in text content.
frontend/src/lib/preferencesStorage.ts: Loads, saves, and resets user UI preferences via localStorage with default values.
frontend/src/lib/rollCommand.ts: Performs basic validation of dice roll command patterns and returns validation status.
frontend/src/lib/sessionExportFile.ts: Creates, downloads, and parses versioned session export JSON files with validation.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears lightweight session context data in localStorage.
Saves, loads, clears, and validates session template data in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human-readable time or date-time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Implements lobby UI for hosting or joining sessions, handling templates and form logic.
frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx: Manages live session UI including channels, documents, and view switching based on selections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, container settings, extended animations, shadows, radii, and loads typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state including chat UI requirements, reply-to-message plans, backend persistence notes, and known issues for message reply implementation.
